articles.title: Trump Wins Iowa Republican Caucus with Decisive Victory
articles.description: Former President Donald Trump secured a significant win in the Iowa Republican caucuses, defeating rivals Ron DeSantis and Nikki Haley with a strong margin of support from conservative voters.

articles.title: US Conducts Airstrikes Against Houthi Targets in Yemen
articles.description: The United States military launched precision airstrikes against Houthi rebel infrastructure in Yemen, targeting sites used to launch attacks on commercial shipping in the Red Sea region.

articles.title: Apple Announces Record Quarterly Earnings
articles.description: Apple reported its quarterly financial results, showing strong iPhone sales and continued growth in services revenue, despite challenges in the global tech market.
